casebody.data:
SCIGRIP, INC., et al.
v.
OSAE, et al. 139A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 14, 2019 K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Benjamin Thompson, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, J. Blakely Kiefer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for SciGrip, Inc., et al. George B. Mast, Attorney at Law, Charles D. Mast, Attorney at Law, Lily VP. Tuttle, Attorney at Law, Smithfield, Clint Mast, Attorney at Law, for Osae, Samuel B. Philip Strach, Attorney at Law, Brodie D. Erwin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Scott Bader, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2019 by Plaintiffs to Close Courtroom During Oral Argument and to Seal Oral Argument Recording:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of January 2019."
